alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Luzerne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 5:41PM EDT until July 14 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Luzerne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Southern Bradford County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Western Wyoming County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 541 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shunk to near Muncy Valley to Iola, and are nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Muhlenberg, Lehman, Harveys Lake, West Franklin, Wilmot, Hollenback, Noxen, Wyalusing, Monroe and Forkston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
